title: Construction Worker/Tradie Olaf
body:
Just thought of this skin guys. I think it would be a cool addition to olaf's collection.

Picture it:

Olaf wearing a yellow construction hat, His two axes replaced with wrenches or hammers (still haven't decided).
Taking off all that Armour and instead, having a Construction Worker's Yellow Vest.

Any thoughts?

replies.body: It makes sense, that would be a cool addition to olaf's skins
